title: Victim in Denver house party shooting identified
content:
DENVER - A victim who died in a shooting at a house party near West Bayaud Avenue and South Bannock Street in Denver has been identified.
Cristian Martinez, 21, was pronounced dead at Denver Health Medical Center at 12:27 a.m. Saturday. His cause of death was determined to be from a gunshot wound.
Three other people were injured in the shooting Friday night.
The suspect, Darius Eugene Ratcliff, 19, has not been found. Police say he is armed and dangerous.
Ratliff is described as 5-feet, 9-inches and 150 pounds with black hair and brown eyes.
Anyone with information on the shooting is asked to call Metro Denver Crime Stoppers at 720-913-7867.
